original_text: And under their hand was an army, three hundred thousand and seven thousand and five hundred, that made war with mighty power, to help the king against the enemy.
korean_text: 그의 휘하의 군대가 삼십만 칠천오백 명이라 건장하고 싸움에 능하여 왕을 도와 적을 치는 자이며

sentences.original_text: And under their hand was an army
three hundred thousand and seven thousand and five hundred
that made war with mighty power
to help the king against the enemy
